<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Blending](/Feats.aspx?ID=2502) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature attempts a flat check to target you while you're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) due to dim light or darkness.

</column>

---

You draw shadows close to create a shroud. Increase the DC of the flat check by 2.
name: Shadow Blending
